description.value: A vocabulary of SNOMED codes that describes whether the patient's family/carer has been informed of the DNA CPR decision.

copyright.value: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

display.value: Carer informed of cardiopulmonary resuscitation clinical decision (situation)
Family member informed of cardiopulmonary resuscitation clinical decision (situation)
